originalTitle: A seat at the table or on the menu? Africa grapples with the new world order
title: A seat at the table or on the menu? Africa grapples with the new world order
content: The US president has shaken up international relations and the continent is working out where it stands.

originalTitle: Kenya's border with Somalia set to re-open after almost 15 years
title: Kenya's border with Somalia set to re-open after almost 15 years
content: Somali Islamist militant group al-Shabab has staged several attacks in Kenya, prompting the border to be closed.

originalTitle: Port city in ruins as storm rips through Madagascar and on towards Mozambique
title: Port city in ruins as storm rips through Madagascar and on towards Mozambique
content: More than half the population is affected and most infrastructure destroyed in Toamasina, Madagascar's main port.

title: Top Goldman Sachs lawyer Kathy Ruemmler resigns over Epstein ties
content: Ruemmler's resignation comes after emails revealed her links to the late sex offender.

originalTitle: Israel deprives Palestinians of proper education by withholding revenues
title: Israel deprives Palestinians of proper education by withholding revenues
content: Palestinian education is being destroyed by Israel's policy of withholding Palestinian Authority customs revenues.

originalTitle: New CIA recruitment video targets Chinese military personnel
title: New CIA recruitment video targets Chinese military personnel
content: The CIA's latest YouTube video offers instructions for how to contact the agency on the encrypted Tor Browser.

originalTitle: Trump revokes landmark ruling that greenhouse gases endanger public health
title: Trump revokes landmark ruling that greenhouse gases endanger public health
content: The White House calls it the largest deregulation in US history, but environmentalists say it will prove costly for Americans.

originalTitle: Analysis: Trump takes victory lap after biggest climate rollback yet
title: Analysis: Trump takes victory lap after biggest climate rollback yet
content: The move marks the culmination of a decade-long push by the president to tear up climate policies he argues stifle industry.

originalTitle: Minnesota immigration enforcement surge is ending, Trump border tsar says
title: Minnesota immigration enforcement surge is ending, Trump border tsar says
content: Two US citizens were killed in Minneapolis during the crackdown dubbed "Operation Metro Surge".

content: Arsenal are four points clear at the top of the Premier League with 12 games to play - but will recent history repeat itself?

title: Arsenal miss chance to restore six-point lead in Brentford draw
content: Arsenal miss out on the chance to restore their six-point lead at the top of the Premier League in a thrilling 1-1 draw at Brentford.

originalTitle: Are football fans booing their team more?
title: Are football fans booing their team more?
content: Booing at football is an accepted part of the game. It's been around since time began, but are fans increasingly booing their own team?
